description: Returns information about Amazon DocumentDB global clusters. This API supports pagination.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A filter that specifies one or more global DB clusters to describe. Supported filters: db-cluster-id accepts cluster identifiers and cluster Amazon Resource Names (ARNs). The results list will only include information about the clusters identified by these ARNs. (dict) --- A named set of filter values, used to return a more specific list of results. You can use a filter to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as IDs. Wildcards are not supported in filters. The name of the filter. Filter names are case sensitive. One or more filter values. Filter values are case sensitive. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: One or more filter values. Filter values are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: GlobalClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: Contains a user-supplied global cluster identifier. This identifier is the unique key that identifies a global cluster.

nested_items.name: GlobalClusterResourceId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region-unique, immutable identifier for the global database cluster. This identifier is found in CloudTrail log entries whenever the KMS customer master key (CMK) for the cluster is accessed.

nested_items.name: GlobalClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the global cluster.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Specifies the current state of this global cluster.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The Amazon DocumentDB database engine used by the global cluster.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The default database name within the new global cluster.

nested_items.name: StorageEncrypted
nested_items.description: The storage encryption setting for the global cluster.

nested_items.name: DeletionProtection
nested_items.description: The deletion protection setting for the new global cluster.

nested_items.name: GlobalClusterMembers
nested_items.description: The list of cluster IDs for secondary clusters within the global cluster. Currently limited to one item.

nested_items.name: DBClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for each Amazon DocumentDB cluster.

nested_items.name: Readers
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for each read-only secondary cluster associated with the Aurora global cluster.

nested_items.name: IsWriter
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the Amazon DocumentDB cluster is the primary cluster (that is, has read-write capability) for the Amazon DocumentDB global cluster with which it is associated.
